title: I Was Reincarnated as a Commoner. I Can’t Stand Living Like This, so I’ll Become an Aristocrat! - Novel Updates
tags: Appearance Different from Actual Age   Aristocracy   Cheats   Cooking   Crafting   Determined Protagonist   Discrimination   Magic   Male Protagonist   Nobles   Overpowered Protagonist   Poor Protagonist   Restaurant   Royalty
author: Aoi Misa   蒼井美紗
description:
After I woke up, it seems I was in 8-year-old boy's body. I was excited at first... But, it turns out I was reincarnated as a commoner, there isn't a bath, there isn't a proper toilet, and the food tastes like crap! Ahh! I want to go back to japan now! Since it's impossible to go back, I am stuck here. And so, I decided to have a goal; 'Have a comfortable life!'

But it seems impossible to even do that... What did you say? Aristocrats have baths? They have a proper toilet? They even have a full bathroom!? Then I'll just become an aristocrat!!

This is the story of the boy who decided to become a noble to become rich and live comfortably, but somehow ended up saving the world without him even knowing it.>
